By convention, the declare-styleable (`ResolverDrawerLayout_LayoutParams`) for a layout parameter class (`LayoutParams`) is expected to be the surrounding class (`ResolverDrawerLayout`) plus "`_Layout`", e.g. `ResolverDrawerLayout_Layout`. (Various editor features rely on this convention.)
